publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3641 Stewart Maxwell: Scotland 21 - 17 Australia—That the Parliament congratulates the Scotland team on beating Australia by 21 points to 17 to win the Plate competition at the 2009 Rugby World Cup Sevens. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor*, Bill Kidd*, Jackie Baillie*, Kenneth Gibson*, Rob Gibson*, Willie Coffey*, Patricia Ferguson*, John Lamont*, Bill Wilson*, Christina McKelvie*, Bob Doris*, John Scott*, Jim Tolson*, Brian Adam*, David Whitton*, Robin Harper* Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S3M-3641 Scotland 21 - 17 Australia (lodged on 9 March 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Anne McLaughlin*, Christine Grahame*, Stuart McMillan*, Aileen Campbell*, Mike Pringle*

S3M-3641 Stewart Maxwell: Scotland 21 - 17 Australia—That the Parliament congratulates the Scotland team on beating Australia by 21 points to 17 to win the Plate competition at the 2009 Rugby World Cup Sevens. Supported by: Jamie McGrigor, Bill Kidd, Jackie Baillie, Kenneth Gibson, Rob Gibson, Willie Coffey, Patricia Ferguson, John Lamont, Bill Wilson, Christina McKelvie, Bob Doris, John Scott, Jim Tolson, Brian Adam, David Whitton, Robin Harper, Jamie Hepburn, Anne McLaughlin, Christine Grahame, Stuart McMillan, Aileen Campbell, Mike Pringle, Michael Matheson*, Gil Paterson*
